summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for the period from May 1, 2014, to May 31, 2014. It includes information about deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest earned, highlighting a significant incoming transfer of $600,000.00.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

persons.name: Michelle F. Saipher
persons.context: Michelle F. Saipher is noted as the source of a significant incoming transfer of $600,000.00 to the account.

persons.name: Darren Kindyke
persons.context: Darren Kindyke is associated with the incoming transfer of $600,000.00, indicating a financial connection to the account.

connections.description: Both individuals are linked through a significant financial transaction involving the account.

events.title: Incoming Transfer
events.description: An incoming transfer of $600,000.00 was made to the account from Michelle F. Saipher.

events.title: Transfer of Funds
events.description: A transfer of $760,000.00 was made from the account.

keyFacts: The document details account balances and transactions for May 2014.
Amanda Kirby is the contact for personal assistance regarding the account.
An incoming transfer of $600,000.00 from Michelle F. Saipher is highlighted.
A transfer of $760,000.00 was made from the account on May 22, 2014.
The account had an ending balance of $6,265.51 as of May 31, 2014.
